channel.title: NPC and walls
channel.description: don't seem to mix too well. All the npcs i added to autospawn walk through the walls and objects that are in their designated walking zone. Could anybody tell me what to change or add so that they walk around objects and stay in the walls? haha

item.title: NPC and walls
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

You have to add Npc clipping or just fix the walking by changing coords.

Read full topic
